name: operation_flag
title: Operation Flag
description: Administrative or clinical warnings about the planned operation e.g. day case surgery, overnight stay, etc

feature.name: time
feature.title: Assessment time
feature.description: Time that this assessment is done

feature.name: code
feature.title: Code for the flag
feature.description: SNOMED-CT or custom code for the flag

feature.name: encounterId
feature.title: Encounter identifier
feature.description: Identifier of the encounter that this study is done
